context: The Estonian word 'koosolek' refers to a formal gathering or assembly of people who come together to discuss common issues, make decisions, or listen to reports. It can be used for various types of meetings such as organizational meetings (board meetings, committee meetings), representative gatherings, public meetings, regular or special sessions, etc. The word is often preceded by modifiers like 'kinnine' (closed), 'lahtine' (open), 'avalik' (public), 'korraline' (regular), or 'erakorraline' (extraordinary/special) to specify the nature of the meeting.
